product_name: Garmin Fenix 2 Special Edition GPS + ABC Watch
long_description: Combining the best features of fitness monitors and outdoor watches in a sporty red and black package, the Fenix 2 Special Edition GPS is an athlete's ideal training partner for any fitness pursuit.
short_description: Combining the best features of fitness monitors and outdoor watches in a sporty red and black package, the Fenix 2 Special Edition GPS is an athlete's ideal training partner for any fitness pursuit.
